Translations.Text: Zhen zhu chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou zaizao tamen, ranhou, nimen bei zhao guiyu ta.
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, fanzui de ren, jiangcheng jusang de.
Tamen de pei zhu zhong, jianglai meiyou wei tamen shuo qing de, tamen jiang fouren tamen de pei zhu.
Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, tamen jiang bici fenli.
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang zai yige shengdi, ganjue kuaile;
zhiyu bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang, yiji houshi de xiang hui zhe, jiang bei jujin zai xingfa zhong.
Gu nimen zai wan xi he zaochen, yingdang zansong zhen zhu chaojue wanwu.
Tiandi jian de zansong, yiji bangwan de he zhongwu de zansong dou zhi guiyu ta.
Ta shi shengwu cong si wu zhong shengchu, shi si wu cong shengwu zhong shengchu, shi yi si de da di fuhuo, nimen ye yao ruci bei fuhuo.
